attributes.action: Block Boris Johnson from honours, titles, peerage and prime minister's pension.
attributes.additional_details:
Alexander Boris De Pfeffel Johnson has dragged this country to new lows, he's embarrassed us globally, damaged our international reputation and squandered billions of our tax money.
He cannot be allowed any titles, honours, peerage or prime minister's pension when we are finally free of him.
attributes.background:
Boris Johnson is not fit to lead us, nor should he be celebrated, honoured and rewarded.
A title after his exceptionally poor premiership would make a mockery of all those honoured before.
